description:
It works 
very good

All I get, is that it is unable to connect and I should try again in a few minutes. 
Does that for days
Once you understand how CUPS snap works and the use of Applications instead of "drivers", it is very good!! love it
My old printer Epson Stylus PHOTO R290 working !

This program is completely useless. Every time I have to make a print, I go to my Windows 10 machine. On a Canon TS 5050 it only prints one job! Than it stops and you have to reboot the machine to print the next one. This happens on Debian systems like Ubuntu. Even on the lastest raspbian vesion (Bullseye) it behaves like this. At least because of this I can nobody convince to use linux.

This program is completely useless. Every time I have to make a print, I go to my Windows 10 machine. On a Canon TS 5050 it only prints one job! Than it stops and you have to reboot the machine to print the next one. This happens on Debian systems like Ubuntu. Even on the lastest raspbian vesion (Bullseye) it behaves like this. At least because of this I can nobody convince to use linux.
Couldn't connect my network printers without this, literally!
I can't find it anywhere in my laptop even though it's installed.
summary: I thought this app delivered free cups to your door but no..

description: Ive used cups on every one of my Linux OS's. Has never failed me yet!! I'm on my first run on UBUNTU and haven't hooked up my printer yet to test, but I'm totally confident that I won't have any problems!!
summary: What could be as good as CUPS?

description: Recent OS upgrade from 14.04 to 22.04. I learned while trying to install my ancient 1012 printer that there was no longer HPLIP support. This app seemed to fit my requirements and works well for my limited needs.
Installed printer and Driver but test page didnt print, wasted my time
The installation was easy. The system recognized my printer. But it didn't from ther on. Nothing.
summary: It appeared to work. It didn't

description: CUPS is installed & configured, sees both of my networked printers, but refuses to print to either of them. Jobs go into que and just sit there with 'no connection'. Both printers work just fine with other terminals. Don't waste you time with CUPS!
easy to install. Not workable.
printers there but wont see commands
My Samsung printers worked with Linux originally. This latest CUPS installation has broken something. Have to hook up a Windows computer to print anything.

Seitdem Cups als snap ausgeliefert wird funktioniert gar nichts mehr auf meinem System. Drucker werden mehrfach angezeigt mit verschiedenen Namen, neue Drucker werden nicht mehr gefunden. einfach nur noch schlimm.
Beispiel eines Systemdialogs:
"Treiber werden gesucht" rödel, rödel, rödel
"Es trat ein Fehler auf"
"Erfolg!"

Was für ein Erfolg? Ich weiß nicht ob es an Cups oder an Ubuntu liegt. Ich werde erst mal die Distribution wechseln.
Vorher hat alles immer perfekt funktioniert.
Simplemente ya no es como antes, hoy deja mucho que desear.

Cette application remplit parfaitement son rôle: 

1- Mon imprimante scanner a été trouvée immédiatement, bien qu'elle est 15 ans d'âge (Canon MP970)
2- j'ai installé le Snap car sans le Snap seul mon scanner était détecté, pas l'imprimante, ce qui est fâcheux, mais peut-être est-ce un problème de manipulation de mon côté
3- je n'ai pas constaté de problème de compatibilité pour mon imprimante, merci Ubuntu car à partir de W10 cette imprimante n'a plus de pilotes fonctionnels (merci l'obsolescence programmée)

Debian 12 bookworm

Fonctionne très bien avec une HP laserjet M234SDWE (Imprimante / scanner)
Все четко распознает
